summary: The legend has it that there's an old man who lives far to the north, where the winds are colder than the heart of a whispmother. He is a secluded and solitary man, and in this one specific night of each year, he wanders in his carriage moved by a group magic elks, bringing doom to lowlives from all around Tamriel, so behave little one.
descriptionHtml:
[i][size=2]
[img]http://files.gamebanana.com/bitpit/untitled-1_81.jpg[/img]


"- The legend has it that there's an old man who lives far to the north, where the winds are colder than the heart of a whispmother. He is a secluded and solitary man, and in this one specific night of each year, he wanders in his carriage moved by a group magic elks, bringing doom to lowlives from all around Tamriel, so behave little one, the last thing you'll want to know is the wrath of the Northern Overlord."

[/size][/i]
[size=3][img]http://files.gamebanana.com/bitpit/features_17.png[/img]

[/size][list][*][size=3]5 wearable items[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]1 facial hair[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Each piece has it's own enchantment[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]2 sets of textures to choose from[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]No weight control :/[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Male Only[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]2 verison of the raven, posed to be used with, or without the cloak.[/size][/*]
[/list][*][size=3]
[/size][/*]

[size=3][img]http://files.gamebanana.com/bitpit/find.png[/img]
[/size]
[size=3]There will be a chest in the road down from Winterhold, just fast travel there and follow the road out of the city, it'll be by a carriage and a couple elks. (View screenshot).
[/size]

[size=3][img]http://files.gamebanana.com/bitpit/ench.png[/img][/size]
[size=3]
[/size][list][*][size=3]Clothing: Fortifies Health[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Boots: Fortifies Stamina[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Cloak: Adds resistance against frost[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Raven: Adds resistance against magic[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Hood: Fortifies Magicka[/size][/*]
[/list]

[size=3][img]http://files.gamebanana.com/bitpit/req_2.png[/img]

None, if you have the game you are good to go.

[img]http://files.gamebanana.com/bitpit/credits_4.png[/img]

[url=http://gamebanana.com/members/1230244]Corvalho[/url]: Model, textures, compilation.
[url=http://gamebanana.com/members/366132]Rafael De Jongh[/url]: Alternate textures.

[/size][img]http://files.gamebanana.com/bitpit/untitled-2_22.jpg[/img]

[img]http://files.gamebanana.com/bitpit/untitled-3_7.jpg[/img]
